    <span id="ctl00_MainContent_DetailedOutput"><h1 class="title">Adult Magma Dragon</h1><i>This entry did not have a separate description for the creature.</i><br /><br /><b><u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true">Recall Knowledge - Dragon</a></u> (<u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=2">Arcana</a></u>)</b>: DC 36<h1 class="title"><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=470">Adult Magma Dragon</a><span style="float:right;">Creature 13</span></h1><a target="_blank" href="Images\Monsters\MagmaDragon.png"><img class="thumbnail" src="Images\Monsters\MagmaDragon.png"></a><span alt="Rare Trait" class="traitrare" title="This rarity indicates that a rules element is very difficult to find in the game world. A rare feat, spell, item or the like is available to players only if the GM decides to include it in the game, typically through discovery during play. Creatures with this trait are rare. They typically can’t be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creatures is increased by 5."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=137">Rare</a></span><span alt="Chaotic Neutral" class="traitalignment" title="Chaotic Neutral">CN</span><span alt="Huge" class="traitsize" title="Huge">Huge</span><span alt="Dragon Trait" class="trait" title="Dragons are reptilian creatures, often winged or with the power of  flight. Most are able to use a breath weapon and are immune to sleep and paralysis."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=50">Dragon</a></span><span alt="Fire Trait" class="trait" title="Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=72">Fire</a></span><br /><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq0204d?Pathfinder-Adventure-Path-148-Fires-of-the-Haunted-City" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 80</i></a><br /><b>Perception</b> +23; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet<br /><b>Languages</b> <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=1"><u>Common</a></u>, <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=2"><u>Draconic</a></u>, <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=18"><u>Ignan</a></u>, <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=22"><u>Terran</a></u><br /><b>Skills</b> <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=1"><u>Acrobatics</a></u> +22, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=3"><u>Athletics</a></u> +28, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5"><u>Deception</a></u> +19, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=7"><u>Intimidation</a></u> +25, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=10"><u>Nature</a></u> +21, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=15"><u>Stealth</a></u> +22, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=16"><u>Survival</a></u> +21<br /><b>Str</b> +8, <b>Dex</b> +2, <b>Con</b> +5, <b>Int</b> +2, <b>Wis</b> +4, <b>Cha</b> +4<hr /><b>AC</b> 34, <b>Fort</b> +26, <b>Ref</b> +21, <b>Will</b> +23; +1 status to all saves vs. magic<br /><b>HP</b> 270; <b>Immunities</b> fire, paralyzed, sleep; <b>Weaknesses</b> cold 15<br /><b>Frightful Presence</b> (<a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=206">aura</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=60">emotion</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=68">fear</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=106">mental</a>) 90 feet, DC 29<br /> <b>Wing Deflection</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction_I.png"> <b>Trigger</b> The dragon is targeted with an attack. <b>Effect</b> The dragon raises its wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the dragon is Flying, it descends 10 feet after the attack.<hr /><b>Speed</b> 40 feet, fly 140 feet; magma swim 40 feet<br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> jaws +27 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=72"><u>fire</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 15 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d10+11 piercing plus 3d6 fire</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> claw +27 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 10 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d10+11 slashing</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> tail +25 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 20 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 2d12+10 bludgeoning</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> horns +25 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 15 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 2d10+10 piercing</span><b>Primal Innate Spells</b> DC 31, attack +23; <b>6th</b> <i><u><a href="Spells.aspx?ID=30">burning hands</a></u></i> (at will), <i><u><a href="Spells.aspx?ID=362">wall of fire</a></u></i> (at will); <b>Cantrips</b> <b>(7th)</b> <i><u><a href="Spells.aspx?ID=236">produce flame</a></u></i><br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Breath Weapon</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=65"><u>evocation</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=72"><u>fire</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=134"><u>primal</a></u>) The dragon breathes a blast of magma that deals 7d6 fire damage and 4d12 bludgeoning damage in a 40-foot cone (DC 33 basic Reflex save). It can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Draconic Frenzy</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one horns Strike in any order.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Draconic Momentum</b> The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Magma Swim</b> A magma dragon’s swim Speed functions only when the dragon is swimming through magma or molten lava.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Volcanic Purge</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png">  If the next action the dragon uses is Breath Weapon, the magma clings to those it damages. Each creature that fails its save against the Breath Weapon takes 3d6 persistent fire damage, and as long as it has this persistent fire damage, it also takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.</span><h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Advice and Rules" title="Sidebar - Advice and Rules" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_1_AdviceAndRules.png"> Magma Dragon Spellcasters</h3>To make a magma dragon spellcaster, remove the dragon’s Draconic Frenzy and draconic momentum abilities and give it the following spells. You can swap out any number of these with other primal spells, provided you keep the same number of spells for each level. You might also want to increase the dragon’s Wisdom or Charisma modifier by 1 or 2 to reflect its mastery of magic. <br /><br /> <b>Young Magma Dragon</b> <br /> <b>Primal Prepared Spells</b> DC 28, attack +20; <b>4th</b> <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=312"><i>stoneskin</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=362"><i>wall of fire</i></a>; <b>3rd</b> <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=119"><i>fireball</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=147"><i>haste</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=367"><i>wall of wind</i></a>; <b>2nd</b> <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=136"><i>glitterdust</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=210"><i>obscuring mist</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=259"><i>restore senses</i></a>; <b>1st</b> <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=5"><i>air bubble</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=140"><i>grease</i></a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=215"><i>pass without trace</i></a>; They lair within volcanically active mountains and throughout the steaming, stony borderlands between the Plane of Fire and the Plane of Earth.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Locations" title="Sidebar - Locations" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_3_Locations.png"> Primal Dragons</h3>Magma dragons belong to a caste of dragons known as primal dragons—massive scaled beings that hail from the Elemental Planes and the Plane of Shadow. Other primal dragons include power-hungry brine dragons from the Plane of Water, whimsical cloud dragons from the Plane of Air, haughty crystal dragons from the Plane of Earth, and sadistic umbral dragons from the Shadow Plane.</span>

  <script>
      initiateToggle(document.getElementById('theme-toggle'));
      initializeMenuToggle(document.getElementById('minMaxMenu'));
      var initializeSearch = function (search) {
          var button;
          var text;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.lastElementChild;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.lastElementChild;

          if (search) {
              search.addEventListener('keypress', function (e) {
                  if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      if (text.value != null && text.value.length > 0)
                          window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
                  }
              })
          }
          if (button) {
              button.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                  window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
              });
          }
      };
      var initializeExpand = function (toggle) {
          var targetAttrString = "[data-target='" + toggle.dataset.toggle + "']";
          //target = menu to be collapsed
          var target = document.querySelector(targetAttrString);
          toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
              var expanded = target.classList.contains('expanded');
              expanded = !expanded;
              if (expanded) {
                  //hide other in group if exists
                  if (target.dataset.group) {
                      var otherExpanded = document.querySelector('.expanded[data-group="' + target.dataset.group + '"]');
                      if (otherExpanded) {
                          otherExpanded.classList.remove('expanded');
                      }
                  }
                  target.classList.add('expanded');
              } else {
                  target.classList.remove('expanded');
              }
          });
      };
      (function () {
          //toggles = link that expands/collapses target
          var toggles = document.querySelectorAll('[data-toggle]');
          toggles.forEach(function (toggle) {
              initializeExpand(toggle);
          });
          //searches
          var searches = document.querySelectorAll('.search');
          searches.forEach(function (search) {
              initializeSearch(search);
          });
      })();
  </script>
